gameDetails.name: Ghost Stories: The Guardhouse Expansion
gameDetails.description:
Ghost Stories - The Guardhouse Expansion adds one village tile (Guardhouse) and five ghost cards (4 ghosts and 1 Wu-Feng) to the original game.

One of the ten village tiles (including this one) is removed. Then the village will be built as usual. The four new ghosts will be shuffled into the deck and four random ghosts will be removed.

The tile lets you look at the top 4 ghosts on the deck, put them back on top in any order you like, and receive 1 Tao token of your choice.

The 5 new ghosts pay homage to 5 real world people involved with the creation of Ghost Stories: Bauza, Provoost, Caumont, Pierô and Coralie.
